data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Anthony Taylor signals a Leeds throw-in in Fulham's half.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Free kick Fulham.
In the minute 3, In Leeds Fulham attack through Joe Bryan. The finish is off target, however.
Leeds have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Goal! Leeds have got their heads in front thanks to a Helder Costa strike.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 8, Leeds push upfield but Anthony Taylor quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 9, Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 11, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Fulham.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 13, Fulham drive upfield and Michael Hector gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 14, Fulham's Harrison Reed breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
In the minute 15, Anthony Taylor awards Fulham a goal kick.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Fulham's area.
In the minute 18, Leeds are in shooting range from this free kick.
Fulham push forward at Elland Road and Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 25, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leeds push upfield and Robin Koch gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Fulham defence.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 27, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Leeds.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 33, An attacking Fulham player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Aleksandar Mitrovic equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
An attacking Leeds player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 41, Goal! Leeds take a 2-1 lead thanks to a Mateusz Klich spot-kick..
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
Anthony Taylor signals a Leeds throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 45, Leeds to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Fulham's Harrison Reed is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Leeds.
The first-half has ended.
Fulham drives forward and Aleksandar Mitrovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 84, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa for Fulham who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa has recovered and rejoins the match in Leeds.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds.
In Leeds, Kalvin Phillips of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 87, Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Fulham's Aleksandar Mitrovic has been booked in Leeds.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Anthony Taylor will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Leeds capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds drive forward but Helder Costa is judged offside.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Leeds.
Fulham's Denis Odoi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-3.
Kenny Tete for Fulham has been booked by Anthony Taylor and receives a first yellow card.
